## Implementation Exercises

:::: {.column width="50%"}
::: fragment

Task 1: **Create a Tag**

In your recipe repository, create an annotated tag named v1.0.0.

:::

:::: {.column width="50%"}
::: fragment

Task 2: Create a GitHub Release

Go to your repository on GitHub.
Click on "Releases" then "Draft a new release".
Choose the tag v1.0.0 from the list or create a new tag.
Fill in the release title and description.
Click "Publish release".
:::
:::
:

:::: {.column width="50%"}
::: fragment

Task 3: Link a Zenodo Record

Connect your GitHub repository to Zenodo.
Follow Zenodo’s instructions to link your repository:
Go to Zenodo and log in.
Go to the “GitHub” tab in your Zenodo settings.
Enable the repository for Zenodo integration.
Create a new release on GitHub to trigger Zenodo to archive your repository and mint a DOI.
:::
:::
::::
